workstations.coal: A steady supply of quality fuel — just what the furnace needs!
workstations.sweet_berry_bush: The berries make a great sauce, and the bush itself — an amazing spice.
workstations.lodestone: Even the best tools need calibration! Always keep a lodestone at hand.
workstations.soul_campfire: The soul fire is a pathway to many abilities some would consider to be unnatural.
workstations.bone_block: Fertilizer aplenty! Better not to think too hard about those bones though...
workstations.conduit: Fish fear me, conduits love me.
workstations.target: Having a test target will definitely help catch flawed designs early!
workstations.cobweb: A ready supply of string, just try not to get it on your hands.
workstations.candle: Better lighting, and the fire hazard keeps you alert. Win-win!
workstations.amethyst_block: Not only do the gems help keep the cutter sharp, they look great in stone too!
workstations.beehive: Looking after livestock and after bees at the same time, what could go wrong?
workstations.ancient_debris: Just a small bit of this stuff makes the tools stronger! What is it even made of?
workstations.anvil: Nothing like a good old anvil to pound a blade into shape.
